message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think you'll find it's worth every penny of my asking price of $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $90 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $110.  This product is high-quality and I'm confident you'll find it's worth it.
I understand that the product is high-quality, but I'm still not comfortable paying $110. I'd be willing to pay $95 for it.
